name: Skynx
content:
Skynx was a Ruurian individual who lived prior to Kho Phon Farrus' enrollment at the University of Bar'leth, years before 3 ABY. A statue of Skynx was present at the university.
Skynx first canonically appeared in the nineteenth issue of the 2020 comic book series Star Wars: Doctor Aphra, written by Alyssa Wong, illustrated by Minkyu Jung, and published by Marvel Comics on March 23, 2022. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, S. V. Skynx first appeared in Han Solo and the Lost Legacy, a novel written by Brian Daley and published in 1980 as the final installment of the Star Wars: The Han Solo Adventures trilogy.
